items.name: accountId
items.title: Account ID
items.description: Account ID to be associated with the query

items.name: criticalThreshold
items.title: Critical threshold
items.description: Value at which the color switches to red

items.name: greenIsHigh
items.title: Above threshold is green
items.description: If checked, values above the threshold display as green and values at or below the threshold display as red
